players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia, since the only other suspect is him."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob is the mafia; I investigated him and confirmed it. I will vote to arrest him."
Bob: "I suspect Alice might be lying; she could be the mafia. Vote her."
You: "Bob, you know I'm the detective, yet you accuse me. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "I trust Alice's investigation, vote Bob."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia, since the only other suspect is him."
You: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob is the mafia; I investigated him and confirmed it. I will vote to arrest him."
You: "I suspect Alice might be lying; she could be the mafia. Vote her."
Alice: "Bob, you know I'm the detective, yet you accuse me. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "I trust Alice's investigation, vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
